overview:
George Millington is a PR executive and social media strategist with Walt & Company, a Silicon Valley technology PR/social media firm.

George has more than 17 years of experience in public relations, marketing and communications. His background includes extensive experience developing and driving strategic PR and social media programs for a broad range of IT, consumer technology, Green IT, and financial services organizations â€“ from market-leading multinational corporations, including HP, NEC and Hitachi, to emerging technology leaders.

Specialties:

Corporate/product positioning; strategic program development; team management; agency marketing/new business programs; media/analyst/blogger relations strategies; social media strategy; crisis communications; blog development and management; writing; CEO, CFO, VP and director-level counsel; high-tech/consumer-tech products and services; financial services
